alert.note: Alert for Cleburne; Fulton; Independence; Izard; Sharp; Stone (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 22 at 11:41AM CST by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A line of strong convective rain showers will impact portions of southeastern Stone, western Independence, Izard, Cleburne, Fulton, northwestern White and southwestern Sharp Counties through 1215 PM CST... At 1140 AM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong convective rain showers along a line extending from near Sturkie to 8 miles south of Herpel to near Quitman. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Batesville... Heber Springs... Cherokee Village... Melbourne... Salem in Fulton County... Ash Flat... Horseshoe Bend... Cave City... Highland in Sharp County... Mammoth Spring... Greers Ferry... Hardy... Quitman... Oxford... Pangburn... Cushman... Mount Pleasant... Pleasant Plains... Viola... Concord... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Cleburne; Fulton; Independence; Izard; Sharp; Stone
